Question: Shenzhen Tuhu Technology co.,ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Tuhu Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: TUHU WATER TOOTHBRUSH P301

- Water toothbrush for oral hygiene
- Countertop oral irrigator PF4
- Electric body brushes XZ-001, XZ-002, XZ-005
- Mini oral irrigators PM1, PM2, PM3
- Oral irrigators P1, P2, P20, P30, P50, P6
- Features food-grade ABS plastic, eco-friendly materials, low-noise, IPX7 waterproof design
- Certified with SA8000:2014, ISO9001, and ISO14001
- Precision mold design and quality control
- Exhibited at CES 2024 showcasing groundbreaking technologies
- Dedicated to research, development, and production of personal care and oral hygiene products
- Focus on enhancing and simplifying personal care routines
- Diverse product portfolio designed for functionality, comfort, and style
- Commitment to uncompromising quality and promoting healthier, happier lives
Summary_cn:
深圳途虎科技有限公司。

产品：途虎水质牙刷 P301

- 用于口腔卫生的水质牙刷
- 台面式口腔冲洗器 PF4
- 电动身体刷 XZ-001、XZ-002、XZ-005
- 迷你口腔冲洗器 PM1、PM2、PM3
- 口腔冲洗器 P1、P2、P20、P30、P50、P6
- 采用食品级ABS塑料，环保材料，低噪音，IPX7防水设计
- 获得SA8000:2014，ISO9001和ISO14001认证
- 精密模具设计和质量控制
- 在CES 2024展会上展示突破性技术
- 致力于个人护理和口腔卫生产品的研发和生产
- 专注于提升和简化个人护理日常的产品组合
- 多样化的产品系列，设计注重功能，舒适和时尚
- 致力于不妥协的质量，促进更健康更愉快的生活
